DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: User Projects
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Different Projects the User was or is involved in","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":38,"WidgetRows":24,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":false,"metricName":"# Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":false,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	v.ClientGroup,
		v.Client,
		v.Project,
		v.ProjectClassificationName,
		v.ProjectTypeName,
		v.Job,
		v.Capacity as Capacity,
		v.[Hours],
		v.AdministrativeHours,
		v.InternalWorkHours,
		v.NewBusinessHours,
		v.BillableHours,
		v.ClientHours,
		v.NonWorkedHours,
		IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ISNULL(v.BillableHours, 0.0) / v.Capacity, 1.0) as UtilizationPercentage,
		IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ISNULL(v.NewBusinessHours, 0.0) / v.Capacity, 1.0) as UtilizationNonBillablePercentage
from (
	select	v.ClientGroup,
			v.Client,
			v.Project,
			v.ProjectClassificationName,
			IIF(v.ProjectTypeName = '', 'Admin', v.ProjectTypeName) as ProjectTypeName,
			v.Job,
			sum(sum(v.Capacity)) over () as Capacity,
			sum(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
			sum(v.AdministrativeHours) as AdministrativeHours,
			sum(v.InternalWorkHours) as InternalWorkHours,
			sum(v.NewBusinessHours) as NewBusinessHours,
			sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
			sum(v.ClientHours) as ClientHours,
			sum(v.NonWorkedHours) as NonWorkedHours
	from (
		select	'' as ClientGroup,
				'' as Client,
				'' as Project,
				'' as ProjectClassificationName,
				'Leave' as ProjectTypeName,
				'' as Job,
				sum(du.Capacity) AS Capacity,
				sum(du.LeaveTime) as [Hours],
				0 as AdministrativeHours,
				0 as InternalWorkHours,
				0 as NewBusinessHours,
				0 as BillableHours,
				0 as ClientHours,
				0 as NonWorkedHours
		from	Analytics.DatamartUser du
		where	(du.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate) and 
				(du.StartDate between @FromDate and @ToDate or
				du.EndDate between @FromDate and @ToDate or
				(du.StartDate < @FromDate and (du.EndDate > @ToDate or du.EndDate is null))) and 
				datepart(dw, du.[Date]) not in (1,7) and 
				du.FullName = @UserName
		union all
		select	dt.ClientGroup,
				dt.Client,
				dt.Project,
				dt.ProjectClassificationName,
				dt.ProjectTypeName,
				dt.[Job],
				0 AS Capacity,
				SUM(dt.ActualTime) AS [Hours],
				SUM(dt.AdministrativeTime) AS [AdministrativeHours],
				SUM(ISNULL(dt.InternalWorkTime, 0.0)) AS [InternalWorkHours],
				SUM(dt.NewBusinessTime) AS [NewBusinessHours],
				SUM(dt.BillableTime) AS [BillableHours],
				SUM(ISNULL(dt.BillableTime, 0.0) - ISNULL(dt.[AdministrativeTime], 0.0)) as [ClientHours],
				SUM(ISNULL(dt.[ActualTime] - (dt.[AdministrativeTime] + dt.[NewBusinessTime] + dt.[BillableTime]), 0.0)) as [NonWorkedHours]
		from	Analytics.DatamartTimesheet dt, [User] u
		where   u.Oid = dt.UserId and
                dt.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate and 
				u.[Name] = @UserName
		group by dt.ClientGroup, dt.Client, dt.[UserId], dt.[User], dt.Project, dt.ProjectClassificationName, dt.ProjectTypeName, dt.[Job]
	) v
	group by v.ClientGroup, v.Client, v.Project, v.ProjectClassificationName, v.ProjectTypeName, v.Job
) v
group by v.ClientGroup, v.Client, v.Project, v.ProjectClassificationName, v.ProjectTypeName, v.Job, v.Capacity, v.[Hours], v.AdministrativeHours, v.InternalWorkHours, v.NewBusinessHours, v.BillableHours, v.ClientHours, v.NonWorkedHours"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","userName"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Utilization per Client
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Actual Hours per Client in % of Total","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#dddddd","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":10,"WidgetRows":11,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Planned","metricFieldValue":"PlannedTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	top 10
		v.Client,
		(v.[Hours] / iif(v.[TotalHours] > 0, v.[TotalHours], 1.0)) as UtilizationPercentage
from (
	select	v.Client,	
			sum(v.BillableTime) as [Hours],
			sum(sum(v.BillableTime)) over () as TotalHours
	from	Analytics.DatamartTimesheet v
	where	v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate and
            (v.CompanyId = @CompanyOid or @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and 
            (v.DivisionId = @DivisionOid or @DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and 
            (v.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid or @DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by v.Client
) v
order by (v.[Hours] / iif(v.[TotalHours] > 0, v.[TotalHours], 1.0)) desc","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","CompanyOid","DivisionOid","DepartmentOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Period Selector
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Closed and In Progress Tickets","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":8,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	sum(v.Capacity) as [Hours],
		v.[Date] as [Date]
from	Analytics.DatamartUser v
where	(Year(v.[Date]) = @year) and 
		(v.CompanyId = @CompanyOid or @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(v.DivisionId = @DivisionOid or @DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(v.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid or @DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by v.[Date]
order by v.[Date]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["year","CompanyOid","DivisionOid","DepartmentOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Utilization per Project Type
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Actual Hours per Project Type in % of Total","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#dddddd","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":32,"WidgetYPosition":10,"WidgetRows":11,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Planned","metricFieldValue":"PlannedTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	iif(v.ProjectTypeName = '', 'Admin Hours', v.ProjectTypeName) as ProjectTypeName,
		(v.[Hours] / iif(v.[TotalHours] > 0, v.[TotalHours], 1.0)) as UtilizationPercentage
from (
	select	top 10
			v.ProjectTypeName,	
			sum(v.ActualTime) as [Hours],
			sum(sum(v.ActualTime)) over () as TotalHours
	from	Analytics.DatamartTimesheet v
	where	v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate and
			(v.CompanyId = @CompanyOid or @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(v.DivisionId = @DivisionOid or @DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
			(v.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid or @DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by v.ProjectTypeName
) v
order by (v.[Hours] / iif(v.[TotalHours] > 0, v.[TotalHours], 1.0)) desc","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","CompanyOid","DivisionOid","DepartmentOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Utilization per Department
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Actual Hours per Department in % of Total","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#dddddd","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":16,"WidgetYPosition":10,"WidgetRows":11,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Planned","metricFieldValue":"PlannedTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	top 10
		v.Department,
		(v.[Hours] / iif(v.[TotalHours] > 0, v.[TotalHours], 1.0)) as UtilizationPercentage
from (
	select	v.Department,	
			sum(v.BillableTime) as [Hours],
			sum(sum(v.BillableTime)) over () as [TotalHours]
	from	Analytics.DatamartTimesheet v
	where	v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate and
			(v.CompanyId = @CompanyOid or @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and 
			(v.DivisionId = @DivisionOid or @DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and 
			(v.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid or @DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by v.Department
) v
order by (v.[Hours] / iif(v.[TotalHours] > 0, v.[TotalHours], 1.0)) desc","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","CompanyOid","DivisionOid","DepartmentOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Utilization per User
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Billable and Non-Billable Actual Hours in % of User Capacity","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":21,"WidgetRows":17,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":false,"metricName":"# Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":false,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	v.DepartmentName,
		v.UserTypologyGroupName,
		v.UserName,
		v.UserHasImage,
		v.UserId,
		v.UserTypeName,
		sum(v.Capacity) as Capacity,
		sum(v.Leaves) as Leaves,
		sum(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
		sum(v.AdministrativeHours) as AdministrativeHours,
		sum(v.InternalWorkHours) as InternalWorkHours,
		sum(v.NewBusinessHours) as NewBusinessHours,
		sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
		sum(v.ClientHours) as ClientHours,
		sum(v.NonWorkedHours) as NonWorkedHours,
		iif(sum(v.Capacity) > 0, isnull(sum(v.[BillableHours]), 0.0) / sum(v.Capacity), 1.0) as UtilizationPercentage,
		iif(sum(v.Capacity) > 0, isnull(sum(v.[NewBusinessHours]), 0.0) / sum(v.Capacity), 1.0) as UtilizationNonBillablePercentage
from (
	select	du.Department as DepartmentName,
			du.UserTypologyGroup as UserTypologyGroupName,
			du.FullName as UserName,
			du.HasImage as UserHasImage,
			max(du.Oid) as UserId,
			du.UserType as UserTypeName,
			sum(du.Capacity) as Capacity,
			sum(du.LeaveTime) as Leaves,
			0 AS [Hours],
			0 AS [AdministrativeHours],
			0 AS [InternalWorkHours],
			0 AS [NewBusinessHours],
			0 AS [BillableHours],
			0 as [ClientHours],
			0 as [NonWorkedHours]
	from	Analytics.DatamartUser du
	where	(du.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate) and 
			(du.StartDate between @FromDate and @ToDate or
			du.EndDate between @FromDate and @ToDate or
			(du.StartDate < @FromDate and (du.EndDate > @ToDate or du.EndDate is null))) and 
			datepart(dw, du.[Date]) not in (1,7) and 
			(du.CompanyId = @CompanyOid or @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and 
			(du.DivisionId = @DivisionOid or @DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and 
			(du.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid or @DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by du.Department, du.UserTypologyGroup, du.FullName, du.HasImage, du.UserType
	union all
	select	dt.Department as DepartmentName,
			dt.UserTypologyGroup as UserTypologyGroupName,
			u.[Name] as UserName,
			u.HasImage as UserHasImage,
			max(dt.UserId) as UserId,
			ut.[Name] as UserTypeName,
			0 as Capacity,
			0 as Leaves,
			sum(dt.ActualTime) as [Hours],
			sum(dt.AdministrativeTime) as [AdministrativeHours],
			sum(isnull(dt.InternalWorkTime, 0.0)) as [InternalWorkHours],
			sum(dt.NewBusinessTime) as [NewBusinessHours],
			sum(dt.BillableTime) as [BillableHours],
			sum(isnull(dt.BillableTime, 0.0) - isnull(dt.[AdministrativeTime], 0.0)) as [ClientHours],
			sum(isnull(dt.[ActualTime] - (dt.[AdministrativeTime] + dt.[NewBusinessTime] + dt.[BillableTime]), 0.0)) as [NonWorkedHours]
	from	Analytics.DatamartTimesheet dt, 
			[User] u, 
			UserType ut
	where	u.Oid = dt.UserId and
			ut.Oid = u.UserType and
			dt.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate and 
			(dt.CompanyId = @CompanyOid or @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and 
			(dt.DivisionId = @DivisionOid or @DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and 
			(dt.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid or @DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by dt.Department, dt.UserTypologyGroup, u.[Name], u.HasImage, ut.[Name]
) v	
group by v.DepartmentName, v.UserTypologyGroupName, v.UserName, v.UserHasImage, v.UserId, v.UserTypeName
order by v.UserTypologyGroupName, v.UserName"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","CompanyOid","DivisionOid","DepartmentOid"]}}]
